_aChangeLog.text: env_fade is not anymore works for every player on the map at the same time
EndTP is always opened after the first env_fade

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Please, everyone who has uploaded the map on public servers - Re-Download the map!

_sText:
Falling through a dream, you wake up in an unusual place. A mystical and at the same time attractive cave. The head hurts and is very dizzy. I got up with difficulty and looked around. In the dark, candles burn and illuminate my path. Who lit these candles?
- I need to find a way out of here as soon as possible...

That map was made for SourceJump Mapping Contest 2021.Â 

Length - Long (Average segmented autobhop route is 3:10~)
Tier - 3 (Medium)

It's HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to play with brightness level value 1.6 (LIGHT)

Music used:
Stage 1: Hoten Neon - The Time Between
Stage 2: Ugasanie - To The Land Of Storm and Mists
Stage 3: Vzglyad Ischezayushego - Neznakomoe Mesto
Ending: The Caretaker - Things That Are Beautiful and Transient

P.S. Since Gamebanana download speed is pretty slow these days, I have added additional download sources (Google Drive & Yandex Drive). Enjoy! :)
